title: Update the statuses of ad groups

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: adgroup_ids
parameters.description: The IDs of the ad groups to be operated on. Size range: 1-20.

parameters.name: operation_status
parameters.description: The operation to be performed on the ad groups. Enum values: DISABLE (pause), ENABLE (enable), DELETE (delete). Note : The status of deleted ad groups or ad groups in deleted campaigns cannot be modified. ENABLE and DISABLE operations are not supported for R&F ad groups.

parameters.name: allow_partial_success
parameters.description: Whether to allow partial success for the operation. Enum values: true , false . Default value: false . If this field is set to true and you specify an operation for multiple ad groups, the operation can succeed for only some of the specified ad groups. In this case, the ineligible ad groups will be filtered out.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: adgroup_ids
fields.description: The IDs of ad groups for which the operation was successful.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The current status of the ad groups for which the operation was successful. Enum values: DISABLE (paused), ENABLE (enabled), DELETE (deleted).

fields.name: error_list
fields.description: Returned only when allow_partial_success is set to true . A list of errors and the corresponding failed ad groups.

fields.name: adgroup_id
fields.description: The ID of the ad group for which the operation failed.

fields.name: error_message
fields.description: The error message associated with the failed ad group.

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log id of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.
